name: Hyperbaroque
description:
A shoot'em up inspired by classics of the genre such as Touhou and Gradius. With an out-there artistic direction that epitomizes the game's name: Hyperbaroque.
Controls:

Arrow keys - Move.

Z - Attack.

X - Parry.

S - Select shot.

Enter - Advance through menu/pause. Hold to skip cutscene and tutorial.

CREDITS:

EPILEPSY WARNING: This game has plenty of flashing lights. If you have epilepsy exercise proper care, and please stay safe.
